title: AfroTech Festival
description: Join us for a night of deep Afro-house and electronic beats at one of Cape Town's most iconic venues.

title: Sunset Sessions
description: Chill vibes and deep house as the sun sets over the V&A Waterfront.

title: Underground Grooves
description: A night of underground electronic music in the heart of Johannesburg.

title: New Year's Eve Special
description: Ring in the new year with an unforgettable night of music by the beach.
